query:
UPDATE secrets 
        SET 
            ciphertext = $2, secret_key = $3, passphrase = $4, recipient = $5, 
            passphrase_required = $6, burn_after_reading = $7,
            access_count = $8, max_views = $9, ttl_minutes = $10,
            created_at = $11, expires_at = $12, updated_at = NOW()
        WHERE id = $1
